I love it when it works, it's a great concept.
Though sadly it sometimes just doesn't really want to connect or the devices aren't visible to each other.
But that might be down to my settings and network hardware setup.
Also it'd be cool if there was a way to just connect it directly to the PC, maybe an integration with Bluetooth features.
If it worked more often an reliably I could get really great utility out of it, but for what it is it is amazing.

Security: make the pairing keys more easy to see/verify when setting up a connection, it used to be better in that regard I think.

THANKS for you awesome work, sincerely.
